text: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

translation.en: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew
translation.id: Seperti itulah azab (di dunia). Dan sungguh, azab akhirat lebih besar sekiranya mereka mengetahui
